raw_text: User asked about implementing a new feature for dark mode toggle in the application settings. They want to ensure proper theme switching across all components.
The AI assistant analyzed the codebase and found that the application uses CSS variables for theming. Proposed a solution using React context for theme state management.
Created a new DarkModeContext component with theme provider that wraps the entire application. This allows any component to access and modify the theme.
User reported a bug where the navigation menu disappears on mobile devices when scrolling. This happens specifically on iOS Safari.
Investigation revealed that the CSS position:sticky property was conflicting with the iOS Safari's bounce scroll behavior. Fixed by using position:fixed with proper z-index.
